name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Peter BALODIS, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Peter BALODIS, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 24th day of September, 1998 the petition for allowance of appeal is GRANTED limited to the issue of whether trial counsel was ineffective for failing to preserve trial objections to the expert witness’s bolstering of the alleged victim’s credibility in his written post-trial motions, thereby waiving the issue for appeal.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, Harvey Sernovitz, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
717 A.2d 530
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Peter BALODIS, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 24, 1998.
Norris E. Gelman, Philadelphia, Harvey Sernovitz, for petitioner.
